Barracks.Name: Barracks
Barracks.Description: You are in the barracks. Here the astronaut's sleeping berths are located.

Bridge.Name: Bridge
Bridge.Description: You are on the bridge of a spaceship.

Engineering.Name: Engineering
Engineering.Description: You are in engineering where you see the engine, fuel and life support. You can access the lander from here as well.

Main Hall.Name: Main Hall
Main Hall.Description: This is the main hall. It connects to the bridge, the barracks and engineering.
